title: SET_BLIP_AS_SHORT_RANGE
content:
0xBE8BE4FE60E27B720x5C67725E// SetBlipAsShortRange
void SET_BLIP_AS_SHORT_RANGE(Blip blip, BOOL toggle);Parameters:blip: The blip handle.toggle: True to only display the blip as 'short range', false to display the blip from a longer distance.Sets whether or not the specified blip should only be displayed when nearby, or on the minimap.
codeBlocks:
// SetBlipAsShortRange
void SET_BLIP_AS_SHORT_RANGE(Blip blip, BOOL toggle);

-- Example usage for SET_BLIP_AS_SHORT_RANGE
SetBlipAsShortRange(0, false)
